allowed-vlans.help: Allowed VLANs to be applied when using this VLAN policy.
allowed-vlans.name: allowed-vlans

allowed-vlans-all.help: Enable/disable all defined VLANs when using this VLAN policy.
allowed-vlans-all.name: allowed-vlans-all

discard-mode.help: Discard mode to be applied when using this VLAN policy.
discard-mode.name: discard-mode

options.help: Discard all frames that are untagged.
options.name: all-untagged

options.help: Discard all frames that are tagged.
options.name: all-tagged

fortilink.help: FortiLink interface for which this VLAN policy belongs to.
fortilink.name: fortilink

untagged-vlans.help: Untagged VLANs to be applied when using this VLAN policy.
untagged-vlans.name: untagged-vlans

vlan.help: Native VLAN to be applied when using this VLAN policy.
vlan.name: vlan

results.help: Configure VLAN policy to be applied on the managed FortiSwitch ports through port-policy.
results.name: vlan-policy
